author: Al Jazeera
title: Iran rejects 'foreign' help as virus death toll nears 2,000
description: Islamic Republic alleges French medical charity MSF staff would serve as 'spies' if deployed on the ground in Iran.
content:
Iran ruled out "foreign" help on the ground to deal with the coronavirus pandemic after an offer from a France-based medical charity, as the country's death toll from the contagion neared 2,000.
"Due to Iran's national mobilisation against the virus and the … [+3342 chars]
